g.text: User initiates a wallet request (e.g. transaction signing) in a dapp
Establish association between Dapp and Wallet
This could be via Android Intent, QR code, etc...
Perform ECDH to obtain a unique session key
cryptochannel ready for encrypted session communication
Dapp session establishment ECDH private keypoint
Dapp session establishment ECDH public keypoint
Dapp ECDSA signature of Q_d with d_a
Wallet session establishment ECDH private keypoint
Wallet session establishment ECDH public keypoint
Shared session establishment AES-128 secret key
